body: Hi Ejnar, Check the attached file. Parallel views are tricky but fortunately Rhino provides the info that we need to re-create the view in Radiance. I thought I [have already fixed this two years ago](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/6) but seems that was not the case. It's fixed now! Also just in case you haven't seen it you can use section planes in Honeybee. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/w1RO3fq7oDYZmrRQxav8VgZU-s395QTLTebVMJUWjizYdBE0RtyxKkjuJyyTYxBZMLzLGGDhjTM*sX6VK633SRg9M50hHRSR/parallelViewWithSectionCut.png) Mostapha
